title: "Spotify Dashboard"

This dashboard is based on Melissa van Bussen's submission to the [Posit PBC's Table Contest](https://posit.co/blog/announcing-the-2024-table-contest). The interactive Quarto dashboard displays the "Today's Top Songs" playlist from Spotify üéµ. The dashboard also includes an embedded Spotify web player, so you can hear the song directly in your browser! Although it's got an interactive dropdown menu, it didn't require a Shiny server -- it's all powered by Quarto + Observable JS + GitHub Actions + GitHub Pages. It updates itself automatically everyday at 9am, it was completely free to create and host, and it never needs to be run locally (unless you want to run it locally üòâ).
